name: Pummel Pets - Alpha 0.1
description:
Pummel Pets is a roguelike monster tamer game made in GB Studio. Collect all 30 elemental pets, take care of them, and use them in battle! 

The game is still in it's alpha phase and is more of a proof of concept than a full game, so please keep that in mind when playing. There is no end goal right now and many features are unfinished or missing. Follow me for future updates and let me know if you find any bugs!

Controls:

movement = arrow keys, wasd
A = z, j, alt
B = x, k, ctrl
start = enter
select = shift

Type effectiveness chart:

I have a huge to-do list but here are some of the more important ones:

  • Passive abilities to make pets unique and combat more interresting.
  • More interactive pets in the garden (feeding, petting, mevement, etc.)
  • Functional berries 
  • Vendors with upgrades
  • Event calendar
  • Progress trophies

This game is free to play on browser but if you want to support me so that i can continue working part time to make make games, consider buying the Game Boy Color ROM file. All future updates are included in your purchase.
